name: Explosive Lobber
entries: Explosive 5. Upon a hit, everything within a radius determined by its explosive value of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC equal to 8 + the firearm's tier x2) or take an additional 1d4 fire damage x the firearm's Tier. If the weapon attack misses, the explosive ammunition fails to detonate. Explosive weapons have their misfire score increased by 1.
Barrel 1. A barrel is a chamber that holds a number of rounds. You can spend a Bonus Action to reload a single round in your barrel.
